description_for_human: Plugin for searching SNOMED CT codes (conceptIds) in the public SNOMED CT Browser.
description_for_model:
Plugin for searching SNOMED CT codes (conceptIds) in the public SNOMED CT Browser. The results should be presented to the user using the SNOMED URIs format.  
 For example,
 1. Cough: http://snomed.info/id/49727002
 2. Dyspnea on exertion: http://snomed.info/id/60845006
